fields.name: Life System (Passive):
fields.value: When this role spawns, a life system will secretly exist during evening phases. Each player starts with 3 lives. Each results, the top 3 who have not ran out of lives will gain a life. The bottom half will lose a life. Anyone who runs out cannot gain lives again. There’s a life cap of 5. If the top 3 and danger zone ever overlap, no more lives may be gained. You will be given a list that shows life count at the start of each night phase.

fields.name: Disqualify:
fields.value: Attack someone for your attack score minus 20% for each life they have. If they have lives left and the attack doesn’t kill, take one.

fields.name: Outlast (2x):
fields.value: Attack someone with an attack score equal to (the amount of your lives - the amount of their lives) x 20%.

fields.name: Mass DNP (1x, 200%):
fields.value: Rampage attack anyone with no lives with your attack score. Any visitors will be attacked with your attack score minus 20% for each life they have.

fields.name: DRP (0x, 70%):
fields.value: Use before results begins during evening or day phase to be able to use two abilities tonight. However, a life count leaderboard will be publicly posted in results.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be alive with exactly one other player.
